item.description: We will be having an open discussion on whether or not humanism is a religion. Individuals are encouraged to talk on their view of humanism and what it means to them. The setting will be a round table discussion. New attendees and those who are new to humanism are invited to attend as this meeting will also serve as an introduction to what people consider humanism to be, a sort of Humanism 101 class.
item.how_to_find_us: Park in the lot. Go through the double doors and hang a right.
item.name: GWH MEETING - September 2008 - Is Humanism a Religion?
